secondaryParam.customValue: "Tom from ABC Controls welcomes David and introduces himself as the manager of the engineering department.Tom explains the open entry-level engineering position, mentioning the need for a bachelor's degree in computer engineering and some hands-on programming experience.David shares that he graduated from DEF University with a degree in computer science and has experience as a computer lab tutor.David expresses his eagerness to learn and grow within the company, highlighting his diligence and fast learning abilities.Tom inquires about David's willingness to work overtime, to which David responds positively, citing his ability to handle heavy workloads during his studies.David asks about the essential qualifications and the type of experience considered relevant for the position.Tom reassures David about the training provided and the opportunities for advancement within the company.The conversation concludes with Tom expressing that David is a good candidate and informing him that he will hear back within a week"
